title: developer (IRC224147)
description: Take advantage of a rare opportunity to start from scratch and build something great. Join GlobalLogic as a Senior Data Science Engineer! The only software development company where opportunities grow in direct proportion to your ambitions. We value progress and it defines us. That‚Äôs why we are looking for passionate people who want to shape the future by creating cutting-edge solutions. Next-generation vehicle controllers, autonomous driving, bodywork, powertrains, and infotainment are just some of the areas for which we develop solutions. Technology will significantly transform the automotive industry over the next decade, and our organization is looking for high-potential candidates ‚Äî maybe you ‚Äî who will digitally transform the company by focusing on the customer experience. Check out the requirements of the position and lead down the path of digital change in the automotive industry. Don‚Äôt hesitate and apply! Requirements: Basic Qualifications:  Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, or related fields  Proficiency in  Python  for algorithm development and analysis, with experience using Jupyter notebooks  Proven experience in algorithm development, scientific research, and mathematical analysis  Strong understanding of algorithmic principles and SQL  Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail  Ability to collaborate in a cross-functional team  Effective communication and presentation skills  Research experience and ability to read scientific articles and implement algorithms described within them  Technical proficiency to work closely with developers, write prototypes, and analyze results for implementation decisions  Nice to have:  Experience in the electric vehicle or transportation industry  Knowledge of software development principles and Agile environments  Previous experience with geospatial data analysis and visualization  Job Responsibilities:  Data Analysis and Visualization  Work with large datasets that need to be analyzed and visualized, as the decision-making processes are being performed by the results of  analysis of this datasets.  Algorithm Development and Optimization  Analyze tours for quality metrics and prototype various algorithms based on scientific publications to find optimal solutions.  Evaluate and validate the performance of current algorithms.  Develop new algorithms to automate and optimize existing processes based on data.  Ensure the correctness and efficiency of algorithms and solutions through quick execution of tasks.  Algorithmic Research and Implementation  Read, understand, and implement functions described in scientific papers to verify if the outcomes meet expectations.  Prepare algorithms based on scientific research and validate their performance and to optimize EV fleet charging infrastructure  Collaborate with developers to test and refine algorithms before features are implemented  Insight Extraction and Communication  Extract and visualize insights from different datasets to drive decision-making.  Communicate findings clearly to stakeholders.  Collaboration  Work closely with product managers and developers to identify and implement the most optimal solutions based on prepared results.  Collaborate with the development team to test solutions and ensure they meet project requirements before full implementation.  Quality Assurance and Testing  Function as a Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET) by working on internal solutions aimed at optimization rather than on the product itself.  Perform testing of his/hers own code, ensuring that algorithms and solutions are tested and meet the required standards before deployment (as the Quality Assurance process per se comes later.)  What We Offer  Empowering Projects:  With 500+ clients spanning diverse industries and domains, we provide an exciting opportunity to contribute to groundbreaking projects that leverage cutting-edge technologies. As a team, we engineer digital products that positively impact people‚Äôs lives. Empowering Growth:  We foster a culture of continuous learning and professional development. Our dedication is to provide timely and comprehensive assistance for every consultant through our dedicated Learning & Development team, ensuring their continuous growth and success. DE&I Matters:  At GlobalLogic, we deeply value and embrace  diversity . We are dedicated to providing  equal  opportunities for all individuals, fostering an  inclusive  and empowering work environment. Career Development:  Our corporate culture places a strong emphasis on career development, offering abundant opportunities for growth. Regular interactions with our teams ensure their engagement, motivation, and recognition. We empower our team members to pursue their career goals with confidence and enthusiasm. Comprehensive Benefits:  In addition to equitable compensation, we provide a comprehensive benefits package that prioritizes the overall well-being of our consultants. We genuinely care about their health and strive to create a positive work environment. Flexible Opportunities:  At GlobalLogic, we prioritize work-life balance by offering flexible opportunities tailored to your lifestyle. Explore relocation and rotation options for diverse cultural and professional experiences in different countries with our company.

description: About the vacavncy:   We are a young and rapidly growing company with more than 100 dedicated and highly skilled developers of various levels. As this opportunity requires working from our office, it is open exclusively to Lviv residents. To apply for this position, you will need to prepare for a technical interview to demonstrate your capabilities, skills, and knowledge.  What we expect from the candidate:    Experience in development using the  Python  programming language is required.  Knowledge of frameworks such as Django and DRF is necessary.  Understanding of the fundamental principles of object-oriented programming is essential.  Proficiency in working with databases such as MySQL and PostgreSQL is important.  Experience with version control systems like Git is mandatory.  The candidate must demonstrate seriousness and the ability to collaborate effectively both in a team and independently.  What we offer:    Convenient work schedule.  Company-provided equipment.  Friendly office atmosphere designed for comfortable work.  Official employment with a competitive salary, taking into account your skills and experience.  Support from an experienced team of developers and managers.  Exciting projects for you to participate in.  Feel free to contact us now; this could be the beginning of our collaboration! We will respond promptly upon receiving your resume.
